Hi there. I'm Sam.

Who me?

I'm a product and UI designer with 10+ years crafting intuitive, high-performing digital experiences for top brands. Skilled in designing scalable systems, motion design, and seamless user interactions that bridge creativity and functionality.

Selected Work

Samsung Bespoke Design Studio

MyFrontier App Redesign

Samsung.com Redesign

CVS Shop Website Redesign

Experience

Motion Designer

NowThis News

Built scalable motion templates and supported early brand identity work for high-volume social video content.

Art Director

Mashable

Led design and motion direction for Mashable's Snapchat Discover presence and managed day-to-day creative production.

Product Designer

Independent

Delivered interactive prototypes and motion systems for product concepts and pitches to align stakeholders and guide build.

Senior Designer

Razorfish

Designed flows, prototypes, and motion interaction systems across enterprise clients, focused on improving customer experience.

Associate Design Director

Razorfish

Leads UX and design systems work across major product redesigns and platforms; mentors teams and drives measurable improvements

Colophon

Sam Stringer-Hye

Experienced Product and UX/UI designer with 10+ years of crafting intuitive, high-performing digital experiences for top brands. Skilled in designing scalable systems, motion design, and seamless user interactions that bridge creativity and functionality.

Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to bring user-centered solutions to life. Passionate about refining and elevating digital experiences through thoughtful design and problem-solving.
